page.title: 08INTERESTING PEOPLE
page.content: Meryl Donald is a really nice lady she is very kind and helpful she lives next to the post office and she is very patient and she takes a joke. We interviewed her because she knows all the people in the village and she has lived here a long time. {q.1How long have you lived in {Auchnagatt? I have lived here all my life which is 57 years. {q.2has Auchnagatt changed a lot? The railway is gone now and the bus service is down to two buses per day 2 into Aberdeen and 2 from Aberdeen {q.3How has it changed?} as I say the railway gone and it was used a lot.You see when we were kids we had to go to 1 school that was Maud and we used the train every day so the train is a big miss.(CONT.ON PAGE 9)
